TopicTitle: [Repost with proper form] Parachute causes NullReferenceException

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I posted earlier about this issue but to be honest, my form was pretty bad so I thought to give another try. I uninstalled KSP (also deleted Steam folder manually) and reinstalled the game. I've started it, made a new default sandbox game, went straight into the VAB and placed an orange tank, on which I mounted approximately 32 radial parachutes (Mk2-R). I notice extreme fps drops doing this.

Here my persistent and log

[http://www./download/z2gn9a1jn42qjir/radialParachute_exception.zip](http://www./download/z2gn9a1jn42qjir/radialParachute_exception.zip)

The game seems to throw a million exceptions.

I hope this post is better! Cya

edit: 

I've narrowed it down a little more. Loading the Kerbal X craft in the VAB causes no issues allthough it has an parachute equipped. I can click the parachute, remount it nothing happens. The NullReferenceException seems to be an editor issue because when I click any parachute in the editor menue on the left I get exceptions thrown. I only need to click it for this to happen, no need to mount it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T20:52:06Z" title="06/23/2015 08:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by KerbalEssences**
